title: Huawei Ascend NPU roadmap examined — company targets 4 ZettaFLOPS FP4 performance by 2028, amid manufacturing constraints
description: Huawei has unveiled its Ascend NPU roadmap featuring Ascend 950, 960, 970 processors and massive SuperClusters with over a million of processors and up to 4 ZettaFLOPS FP4 performance in 2028, shifting from chip scaling to system-level scaling, amid U.S. sanc…
content: In addition to announcing its first AI cluster with 1 FP4 ZettaFLOPS performance, Huawei also revealed a detailed roadmap of its upcoming Ascend neural processing units (NPUs) that accelerate AI work… [+15589 chars]
